meanings.definition: The act or process of making plans for something.
meanings.sent1: Her planning for the party started weeks in advance.
meanings.sent2: The company's planning for the new project was meticulous.
meanings.sent3: His planning for the camping trip included a detailed list of snacks.
meanings.sent4: The success of the business was attributed to careful planning.
meanings.sent5: The wedding planner's expertise in planning made the event unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The organization of tasks or events in advance.
meanings.sent1: Effective planning ensured the conference ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The planning for the school play involved coordinating schedules.
meanings.sent3: The meticulous planning of the surprise party kept it a secret.
meanings.sent4: The planning of the road trip was like putting together a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The detailed planning of the project impressed the team members.

meanings.definition: A detailed proposal for doing or achieving something.
meanings.sent1: She presented her planning for the marketing campaign to the team.
meanings.sent2: The planning for the renovation project included cost estimates.
meanings.sent3: His planning for the charity event outlined every aspect.
meanings.sent4: The detailed planning for the event impressed the sponsors.
meanings.sent5: The business plan's thorough planning impressed potential investors.
